description: The image depicts a man standing in front of a sign. The man appears to be middle-aged, with blonde hair and is wearing a dark blue suit with a red tie. He is looking to the side, away from the camera, and his expression is serious.  The sign behind him is white with blue and red text. It contains statistics related to baking goods, specifically percentages of increase in various food items. The text on the sign reads "BAKING GOODS +27.2%," followed by specific percentages for "BUTTER +30.9%," "MARGARINE +37.5%," "FLOUR +38.3%," and "COOKING OIL +38.3%." There are also images of a loaf of bread, a stick of butter, a roll of margarine, a bag of flour, and a bottle of cooking oil, each corresponding to the percentage increase mentioned.  The setting appears to be outdoors, with a building visible in the background. The style of the image is a candid photograph, likely taken during an event or press conference, given the context of the sign and the attire of the man.
